org.jerkar.api.depmanagement

Class JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentScopeableBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkDependencies.Builder
      • org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentScopeableBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentModuleDepBuilder
    Enclosing class:
    JkDependencies.Builder

    public static class JkDependencies.Builder.JkFluentScopeableBuilder
extends JkDependencies.Builder
    Returned type after an addition of a JkDependency. This type allows to chain definition of scopes.
